name: Magical Scales of Libra
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can declare a Level from 1 to 6, then target 2 face-up monsters you control; until the end of this turn, reduce the Level of 1 monster by the declared Level, and if you do, increase the Level of the other monster by the declared Level. You can only use this effect of "Magical Scales of Libra" once per turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
A sentient scale. It maintains the balance of the world, but often gets mistakenly used as a mace.
str1: Select a monster to reduce the level
str2: Select a monster to increase the level
